channel.title: A blog by Felix Bert
channel.description: Recent content on A blog by Felix Bert

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Felix Bert and this is my personal homepage. I am interested in all things related to data analysis and programming. You can find my CV here shortly: Curriculum Vitae. Currently, I am finishing my master’s degree in business administration and engineering at TU Darmstadt. After graduation at the end of this year, I am looking for opportunities to work with data. If you are interested in a conversation, please contact me via e-mail or on LinkedIn.
